nodes.text: What can I do for you?
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: So long and happy clue hunting!
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Hey Arthur, can I start receiving clue from vessels?
They're clogging up my backpack!
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text: Goodbye.
nodes.title: <player>

text.ENG: Yes please, I want to stop receiving vesseled containers.

nodes.text:
Very well, you'll no longer find clues from mining,
fishing and woodcutting.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: Yes please, I want to stop receiving vesseled containers.
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text: Nevermind.
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text:
Vessel containers include mining geodes, fishing bottles
and clue nests. Are you sure you want to stop
receiving them?
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Hey Arthur, can I stop receiving clue from vessels?
They're clogging up my backpack!
nodes.title: <player>

text.ENG: Ask about the types of clues.

nodes.text: Is there anything else I can help you with?
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
You will see a couple of words that may or may not
make sense together. You will have to rearrange the
letters to make the name of the person you need to talk
to.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
There are also challenges that will involve you gathering
an item or crafting an item for a certain person.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Unfortunately, the only type of challenge that you will
be given is a skill challenge.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
A ciper is a string of letters that have been scrambled
using the shift cipher method.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
An example of this would be ZCZL which, shifted
forward by one, would be Adam.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
This type of clue have you talk to someone around
Gielinor. Although the clue does not tell you exactly who
to talk to. This type of challenge only appears in clue
tiers medium, hard and elite.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
This type of clue has you work out a logical problem
for the person you need to talk to. This type of
challenge only appears in tiers medium, hard and
elite.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
After you find the place you need to dig, you may find
a casket or another scroll.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
This  type of clue will have you use a sextant, chart and
a watch to find out the place you will need to dig. This
type of challenge only appears in clue tiers medium and
above.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
But the higher the tier of clue, the more steps you will
have to do beforehwand. An example of this would be
needing to find a key before opening a chest.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Unfortunately, you will only be given the easier ones in
beginner clues.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
This type of clue can be as simple as talk to the
This type of clue can be as simple as talk to the
specified person or searching a crate in a specified
location.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
At this location you will need to perform an emote, as
well as wear the items that you had to bring along.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: Some clues may have you wear nothing at all.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: But please don't do that in public!
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
This type of challenge only appears in clue tiers
medium and above.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
This type of clue will give you a location that you will
need to visit, along with some items you will need.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
You will then need to use this device to find the location
you will need to dig.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: You will only need to talk to Reldo for beginner clues.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Depending on the tier of clue, you will need to obtain a
strange device from either Reldo, located in Varrock, or
Jorral, located south of Tree Gnome Stronghold.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Puzzle boxes are puzzles that will have you complete a slider puzzle that, when complete, will look like an image
in game.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Light boxes are a puzzle which contains a 5 by 5 grid
of lights with some lights on and some lights off.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
The puzzle will have you click the buttons below to turn
on or off some of the lights with the end goal being,
having all the lights turned on.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
There are many different puzzles that you can come
across while doing clues. These range from light boxes to
puzzle boxes.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: This type of clue will show you a map of an area.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
This type of clue will show you which fairy ring code
you will need to use to get to the right place to dig.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
This map will show you where you will need to dig, or
what you will need to search to get the next clue.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
You will then need to use the numbers to figure out
where you will need to dig after arriving to your
destination.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: Unfortunately, this type of clue is members only.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: Unfortunately, this type of clue is members only.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: Unfortunately, this type of clue is members only.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: What are more advanced clues?
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text:
Unfortunately these are members only but I will explain
them to you.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
You can gain advanced clues by the same way you would get a beginner clue. But to get higher tier scrolls you
will need to defeat more powerful foes.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
The chance to get a higher tier clue from geodes,
bottles and nests is lower the higher  the tier. But if you
chop down higher-level trees you will have a higher
chance of receiving a nest which contains a clue. Same
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: with fishing and mining.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: The only exception to this is master clue scrolls.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Master clues can only be obtained as a rare chance when opening your casket or by handing in one of
every type of clue, apart from beginner, to Watson who
resides in Hosidius.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: But with more advanced tiers of clue, come better loot.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: TOGGLE(CLUE_VESSELS)
nodes.title: Condition Branch

nodes.text: Arthur's eyes light up.
nodes.title: EMPTY

nodes.text: What are beginner clues?
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text: Advanced clues have tiers between easy and master.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Beginner clues are the lowest tier of clue scroll and as
such only require a couple of steps to solve.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Beginner clues are gained through various activities.
Those activities are as follows.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Slaying monsters for a chance at a clue being dropped.
I hear goblins are sneaky, maybe they have some clue
scrolls on them ripe for the taking.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Maybe someone left one in the cow field, who knows
where you could obtain them.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Beginner clues have also been known to be left in]
geodes while mining, as well as sometimes in bottles that
you may fish up from time to time and from nests
which fall out of trees.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: Although this is a much rarer occurance.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Unlike more advanced clues, you should not expect to
get very valuble items from completing a beginner
clue.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: Nevermind.
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text: Is there anything else I can help you with?
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text:
Very well, you'll now find clues from mining, fishing
and woodcutting.
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

nodes.text: Yes please, I want to start receiving vesseled containers.
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text:
Vessel containers include mining geodes, fishing bottles
and clue nests. Are you sure you want to start
receiving them, again?
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter

text.ENG: Yes please, I want to start receiving vesseled containers.

nodes.text:
This type of clue has you talk to someone around
Gielinor. Although the clue does not tell you exactly who
to talk to
nodes.title: Arthur the Clue Hunter
